body_html: @SsnL It does work, just looks slightly different. I'm sure there is a way to tweak it to extend the delimiters a bit if need be in this case, but the main point here is that Katex isn't a drop-in replacement...there is a bit of editing/proofing to get it just right, and every equation on the site needs to be looked at.
